content: 1996 Singaporean TV series or program ***The Unbroken Cycle*** (解连环) is a TV drama series produced by the former [Television Corporation of Singapore](/wiki/Television_Corporation_of_Singapore) (predecessor of [MediaCorp](/wiki/Mediacorp), starring Singapore actors [Fann Wong](/wiki/Fann_Wong) and [Thomas Ong](/wiki/Thomas_Ong). A television [adaptation](/wiki/Adaptation) of a mystery novel by Singaporean novelist Wu Weicai about the fate of two star-crossed lovers over three lifetimes in pre-war (1920s), post-war (1950s) and modern Singapore, this 1996 drama serial won [Fann Wong](/wiki/Fann_Wong) her first regional nomination as Best Actress at the [Asian Television Awards](/wiki/Asian_Television_Awards). ## Cast - [Fann Wong](/wiki/Fann_Wong) - Ye Qin, Li Xiangmei, Zhu Zhiyue (Fourth Wife) aka Xibao - [Thomas Ong](/wiki/Thomas_Ong) - Zhou Xinghuan, Zhang Hai - [Carole Lin](/wiki/Carole_Lin) - Huang Peiru - *Jie lian huan* at [IMDb](/wiki/IMDb_(identifier)) This Singaporean television-related article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e
title: The Unbroken Cycle
